Body:
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.TC200, ['pid?', 'pgain=2'], ['pid?',
    '2 0 220', '> pgain=2', '> '], sep='\r') as tc:
    assert tc.p == 2
    tc.p = 2
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.TC200, ['pid?', 'igain=0'], ['pid?',
    '2 0 220', '> igain=0', '> '], sep='\r') as tc:
    assert tc.i == 0
    tc.i = 0
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.TC200, ['pid?', 'dgain=220'], ['pid?',
    '2 0 220', '> dgain=220', '> '], sep='\r') as tc:
    assert tc.d == 220
    tc.d = 220
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.TC200, ['pid?', 'pgain=2', 'igain=0',
    'dgain=220'], ['pid?', '2 0 220', '> pgain=2', '> igain=0',
    '> dgain=220', '> '], sep='\r') as tc:
    assert tc.pid == [2, 0, 220]
    tc.pid = 2, 0, 220
